title: Kentucky State Police logo
content:
Need to ID typeface for both the word STATE as well as the one for KENTUCKY POLICE. Thanks a bunch whoever can help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081209045022im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kentucky-state-police_4108.png)

 [‹ Reader's Digest font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081209045022/http:/typophile.com/node/48577 "Go to previous forum topic") [Classic Pistilli Roman style font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081209045022/http:/typophile.com/node/48573 "Go to next forum topic")
author: whitespace

comments.content: KENTUCKY POLICE has a hand drawn [ITC Symbol](http://web.archive.org/web/20081209045022/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/itc_symbol_std_bold/?sample_text=KENTUCKY%20POLICE) look to it.
